Inc.","details":"Implements a multi-step transfer approval workflow:      1. Seller requests transfer with proposed buyer and price      2. GP reviews and either rejects, approves directly, or starts ROFR period      3. During ROFR period, existing members can match the offer      4. If ROFR exercised, original buyer is replaced; otherwise transfer proceeds      5. Buyer completes transfer by paying and receiving tokens WORKFLOW STATES: - PENDING: Transfer requested, awaiting GP review - ROFR_PERIOD: GP started ROFR offer period for existing members - APPROVED: GP approved (after ROFR expired/waived or no ROFR needed) - ROFR_EXERCISED: Existing member matched the offer - REJECTED: GP rejected the transfer - COMPLETED: Transfer executed successfully - CANCELLED: Seller cancelled before approval","errors":{"AccessControl_CallerIsNotAuthorized(address,bytes4)":[{"params":{"caller":"Address attempting the call","functionSig":"Function selector that was called"}}],"SafeERC20FailedOperation(address)":[{"details":"An operation with an ERC-20 token failed."}]},"events":{"UserRoleUpdated(address,uint8,bool)":{"params":{"enabled":"True if role was params._defaultRofrDuration: Default ROFR period in seconds (e.g., 30 days = 2592000)
params._token: The token contract this module is attached to

executeTransfer(uint256).details: Buyer must have approved this contract to spend payment tokens

exerciseROFR(uint256).details: Caller must be an existing token holder (not the seller)

processTransfer(address,address,bytes32,.details: OPTIONAL: Only implement if module needs to track stateThis function is called AFTER successful transferIf not implemented, TokenComplianceFacet will ignore call failure

params.pricePerToken: Price per token in payment token units

returns.requestId: The ID of the created request

params.duration: ROFR period duration in seconds (0 = use default)

validateTransfer(address,address,bytes32.details: MUST be view/pure function (called via staticcall)This function is called BEFORE transfer execution

params.lotId: Lot ID being transferred (bytes32(0) for ERC-20 transfers)

returns._0: True if transfer is compliant, false otherwise

activeRequestBySeller(address).notice: Active request by seller (seller can only have one pending at a time)

approvedTransfers(address,address).notice: Approved transfers ready for execution (seller => buyer => amount)

cancelRequest(uint256).notice: Cancel a pending transfer request (seller only)

defaultRofrDuration().notice: Default ROFR period duration (can be overridden per request)

exerciseROFR(uint256).notice: Exercise ROFR (existing member matches the offer)

isTransferApproved(address,address,uint2.notice: Check if a transfer is approved

startROFRPeriod(uint256,uint256).notice: Start ROFR period for existing members to match offer

token().notice: The token this module is attached to

validateTransfer(address,address,bytes32.notice: Validate if a transfer is compliant
